item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 24, 2024 at 3:35 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Evidence of oldest known alphabetic writing unearthed in ancient Syrian city (141 points | 85 comments)
2. Bocker: Docker implemented in around 100 lines of Bash (2015) (93 points | 34 comments)
3. Ice base melt revealed by multibeam imagery of an Antarctic ice shelf (53 points | 1 comment)
4. Antenna Diodes in the Pentium Processor (136 points | 23 comments)
5. Continuous Integration Dashboard for Apache NuttX RTOS (Prometheus and Grafana) (43 points | discuss)
6. Highest-resolution images ever captured of the sun’s surface (393 points | 109 comments)
7. Establishing an etiquette for LLM use on Libera.Chat (43 points | 30 comments)
8. Size and albedo of the largest detected Oort-cloud object (87 points | 39 comments)
9. A century later, a taped message solves the mystery of a WWI doughboy's death (20 points | 2 comments)
10. Anti-scale: a response to AI in journalism (19 points | 6 comments)
11. Three hundred words you can spell on a calculator [pdf] (10 points | 5 comments)
12. A short introduction to Interval Tree Clocks (35 points | 5 comments)
13. The remarkable life and astonishing times of Dwight Smith Young (20 points | 1 comment)
14. Stack Analyser: detect technologies used inside a repo (27 points | 1 comment)
15. Using GPS in the Year 1565 (145 points | 18 comments)
16. OpenMPTCProuter: Aggregate and encrypt multiple internet connections using MPTCP (134 points | 32 comments)
17. 1 Dataset. 100 Visualizations (39 points | 11 comments)
18. Music as Language (2019) [pdf] (33 points | 4 comments)
19. The Physics of Butterfly Wings (41 points | 7 comments)
20. Quake 3 Source Code Review: Network Model (2012) (279 points | 61 comments)
21. The biggest blocker to LibreOffice adoption? LibreOffice (15 points | 9 comments)
22. MaXX Interactive Desktop -- the little brother of the great SGI Desktop on IRIX (143 points | 60 comments)
23. Dear sir, you have built a compiler (2022) (335 points | 189 comments)
24. Energy is frame-dependent, infrastructure of energy is frame-independent (2020) (9 points | 5 comments)
25. How to give a senior leader feedback (without getting fired) (148 points | 136 comments)
26. Computer Networking Fundamentals – Learning Series (2023) (138 points | 11 comments)
27. Baby’s Second Garbage Collector (129 points | 1 comment)
28. Firefox DevTools Network Tab: How to filter requests by properties (4 points | discuss)
29. Alloy Automation (YC W20) Is Hiring ( | hide)
30. AI PCs make users less productive (25 points | 9 comments)
